FuncDef: This command configures the number of ports down along with level for the MCAC policy on this interface.

ParaDef.Info: If the number of ports available in the LAG is reduced by the number of ports configured in this command, then the bandwidth allowed for a bundle or interface will be as per the levels configured in this context. Values-1 to 64 (for 64-link LAG).
Specifies the bandwidth for a given level. Level 1 has the highest priority. Level 8 has the lowest priority. Values-1 to 8.
